Subject: The Profecy


> OOC:this will be my last post until Tuesday, Im going on yet another
vacation!
>
> :::Data and Defection landed in North America. What waited for them was a
> great orb that was flashing pictures, They put there hands to it and saw
what
> Herald had seen so long ago:::
>
>     a battle, Every spark on Earth was there, Mech fluid and bodies folded
> the valley. The many Factions fought senselessly. Defection was in the mid
> trying desperately to stop it all, DataStreaks body lay fallen and
crumpled
> in the rising pool of mech. They looked to the sky and saw Countless
angles
> Battling there was Heraldangle singing a song of peace that was nearly
> drowned out by the bloodlust cries of the innocent falling and the
untruthful
> prevailing then an explosion, defection had sacrificed himself for Hot
> Rod.They saw Gigatron Fighting to get to defection and then seeing his
corps.
> herald had just put himself in front of one of ArcAngles FireBalls saving
> Prowls life.ArcAngle, In all of his glory had lost someone close to him.
then
> all were dead, the Iliad of the bots had ended in complete and utter
death.
> Data Defection  and Herald Suddenly froze for 2 days.
>
